FuncDef:
The graceful-restart command enables GR globally on a BGP speaker.
The undo graceful-restart command disables GR globally. The graceful-restart command enables GR globally on a BGP speaker. The undo graceful-restart command disables GR globally. By default, GR is disabled globally.
ExtraInfo: A BGP restart causes traffic interruption. To prevent traffic interruption, run the graceful-restart command on a BGP speaker to enable GR globally. This enables all the peers specified on the BGP speaker to perform GR during a BGP restart.
